item.description:
Looking for something fun to do on New Year's Eve and a fun group of people to hang out with? Then join us for the NYE Resolution Ball at the World Trade Center, Boston. Please note- there are different options on the website for the NYE event- we will be going to the "party only" portion which starts at 9:30pm. The grand celebration will feature the Felix Brown Band and NYC DJ Samuel L., dancing, midnight toast, and party favors. It is black tie optional. To get your tickets visit:

http://www.bostoneventguide.com/beg.php?Clk=4010416

Tix must be purchased in advance.

 

There currently is a special running of only $69. Prices go up as the event gets closer, so get yours soon! We will meet inside the main entrance to the ballroom, directly after the ticket area. If you have trouble finding us, please call Deanna at 508 333 3191. Look forward to seeing you for an awesome night ringing in the new year!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Deanna (see photo) inside event ballroom- directly after ticket entrance. Please call 508-333-3191 if you have trouble finding us.
item.name: New Year's Eve Resolution Ball, Boston. Discounted Tix!
